mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SSP_TRANSACTIONS ( REQ_ORG_CODE, REQ_ORG_TX_DATE, REQ_ORG_TX_TIME, GLN_TX_NO, PAY_CODE, BAR_CODE, QR_CODE, VALID_SECOND, ORIG_BALANCE, NEW_BALANCE, TX_AMT, TX_CUR, TX_EX_RATE, STATUS, APPROVE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #{reqOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqOrgTxDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqOrgTxTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{glnTxNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BAR_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{QR_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{VALID_SECOND,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{origBalance,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{newBalance,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{txAmt,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{txCur,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txExRate,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveDateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT REQ_ORG_CODE as reqOrgCode, REQ_ORG_TX_DATE as reqOrgTxDate, REQ_ORG_TX_TIME as reqOrgTxTime, GLN_TX_NO as glnTxNo, PAY_CODE as payCode, BAR_CODE as barCode, QR_CODE as qrCode, VALID_SECOND as validSecond, ORIG_BALANCE as origBalance, NEW_BALANCE as newBalance, TX_AMT as txAmt, TX_CUR as txCur, TX_EX_RATE as txExRate, STATUS as status, APPROVE_DATETIME as approveDateTime FROM SSP_TRANSACTIONS WHERE GLN_TX_NO=#{glnTxNo} AND STATUS=#{status} AND ROWNUM=1
